title: Update Early Access JDK Build to 19-ea, add 18 to regular CI

labels.name: area/housekeeping
labels.description: Issue type for generalized tasks not related to bugs or enhancements

labels.name: area/infra-automation
labels.description: anything related to CI, bots, etc. that are used to automated our infrastructure

body:
### Description

18 reached GA last month, time to move on.

Current issues:
- [x] as usual, Groovy and Gradle need updates:
  - [x] https://github.com/apache/groovy/pull/1690#issuecomment-1088622192
  - [x] https://github.com/gradle/gradle/issues/20372
  - [x] Groovy in `maven-invoker-plugin` is a bit of a mess, analyzing...
- [x] Mockito/ByteBuddy needs an update as well: https://github.com/raphw/byte-buddy/issues/1228
  PR: #24912
- [x] Temurin build `19-beta+15-202203260328` fails with a TLS/SSL issue while trying to download mvnw but Zulu `build 19-ea+14` gets past that
  _Obsolete since switching to java.net distribution via #26374_

See also: https://quarkusio.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/187038-dev/topic/Java.2018.20.26.2019.20EA

WIP: https://github.com/famod/quarkus/tree/ci-jdk-19-ea

### Implementation ideas

_No response_
